channel.title: Tired of rapidshare dl limit? i am thats why i use this!
channel.description:
hi, i have been seaching for a way to crack rapidshare download limit.
and i finaly found it!!
NOTE: i did not make this i found it.
[url=http://www.tech-recipes.com/rx/869/rapidshare_hacks_beat_download_limits_waiting_time]http://www.tech-recipes.com/rx/869/rapidshare_hacks_beat_download_limits_waiting_time[/url]
find this one : 3. Use a proxy with SwitchProxy and Firefox
worked for me, but will make alot!!!!! of lag if u got slow internet like me and a sucker pc..
may cause problems cuz other use this and some proxys are blocking rapidshare.
by the way here is a proxy list, with proxys from all over the wrold [url=http://www.samair.ru/]http://www.samair.ru/[/url]
NOTE: i did not find this or make it (like i could ^^) it was guy that wanted to help me find proxys helped me and gave me this.
hope this will help you all that use rapidshare but wont pay or cant pay for premium
P.S. if you want to search for some of the files and rapidshare go to [url=http://www.rapidshare.org]www.rapidshare.org[/url]

item.title: Tired of rapidshare dl limit? i am thats why i use this!
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Dark_Sniper”]ok you know the old way was

javascript:void(c=0)

and it bypasses the countdown…

you cant do it anymore but you can still speed up the countdown(by a little bit)

like lets say you have to wait 0.5 min

put this into your address bar
javascript:void(c=c-2)

and press the go arrow every 1 second or so (not to fast)

and it will speed the countdown for you…

im still testing on how to bypass the whole thing

New by subin:
Quote:
another gud way there is this site it creates PREMMIUM LINKS INSTANTLY !! u dont even have to wait at all ( 9 secs - also bandwidth may run out ) … www.proxiez.net
this also works but has the problem of runniong out of bandwith so… still working on the bypass.

PS

Me and a leet h4z0r r still experimenting well let you know when we break rapidshare
rep pl0x[/quote]

You can speed it up as stated above and I’m almost done making my RSB in php.

Read full topic
